result.execSummary:
The defendant NEIL W WATKINS was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Due July 29, 2022.
All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. NEIL W WATKINS

records.addlTxt:
9:06 AM Defendant NEIL W WATKINS appeared by phone from Rusk County Jail.  Attorney David W. Field in court for NEIL W WATKINS.  Attorney Sara Matthews in court for State of Wisconsin. 
22CM33 & 21CM235
Plea Questionnaire was signed telephonically-Defendant confirms and court has copy
Defendant pleas no contest to count 1 in 22CM33
Attorney Field states defendant is voluntarily, knowingly and intelligently making plea
Defendant waives right to appear in person
Court accepts pleas as voluntarily, knowingly and intelligently made and finds defendant guilty. 
Factual basis and probable cause found
State requests for sentence to be concurrent to sentence serving now

Sentence:
45 days jail with Huber, concurrent with any other sentence
21CM235 DRI in its entirety
5 days jail credit
$443.00 court costs
Jail / 1204

11:45 AM Prosecuting attorney Sara Matthews in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant NEIL W WATKINS appeared by video, in custody in Rusk County. 
21CM235 & 22CM33
No resolution. 
Jury trial currently scheduled, counsel has TP trial scheduled out of county on the same day with pending Summary Judgment.  Final status scheduled to determine status of calendar. 
Defendant addresses no contact condition of bond. 
Motion to be filed. 
Bond continued.
Status conference scheduled for June 29, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Status conference on June 16, 2022 at 11:30 am.

11:17 AM Prosecuting attorney Lawrence Jean Broeren in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant NEIL W WATKINS not in court.  Attorney David W. Field in court for NEIL W WATKINS. 
Incarcerated out of county. 
Jury Trial currently scheduled. status to be scheduled. 
Bond continued.
Jury trial - 12 person on July 15, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Status conference on May 31, 2022 at 11:00 am.

9:02 AM Prosecuting attorney Scott Zehr in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant NEIL W WATKINS not in court.  Attorney David W. Field in court for NEIL W WATKINS. 
Attorney Field enters not guilty pleas on all counts in both files on behalf of the defendant. 
Attorney Field requests to set 21cm235 for trial. 
To be scheduled with the JA.
Bond faxed to Rusk County Jail for signature/7269

BOND COVERS 22CM33 (new) & 21CM235 (amended)
Not to possess or consume any alcohol or any illegal drugs
Not to go on any premises where primary purpose is the sale of alcohol.
No contact with Victim 1 or their residence

10:13 AM Defendant NEIL W WATKINS in court with Attorney David W. Field.  Defendant NEIL W WATKINS in custody in Rusk County.  Sara Matthews appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  NEIL W WATKINS appeared by video means with Attorney.
Attorney waives reading of complaint. 
Defendant is informed of charges. 
Defendant received copy of Criminal Complaint.
  Pre-trial conference scheduled for March 24, 2022 at 09:00 am.  Review hearing scheduled for April 20, 2022 at 09:00 am.
